fields.name: **__#1 - Respect other members / No Flaming__**
fields.value: Refrain from upsetting other users by insult, name calling, denigration, threats, or any form of harrasment. There is no reason to be a dick.

fields.name: **__#2 - Do not flood the server with messages__**
fields.value: Flooding is when someone sends many messages in a short amount of time. It can be disruptive and annoying to other users, so please do not do it.

fields.name: **__#3 - Respect the staff__**
fields.value: Listen and cooperate with members of staff; refusing to do so may result in you being warned, kicked, and/or banned from the server.

fields.name: **__#4 - Read the channel topics before posting__**
fields.value: Each text channel has their rules, guidelines, and tips in their headings. It is your responsibility to read and follow them.

fields.name: **__#5 - Absolutely no NSFW or illegal content__**
fields.value: No porn, gore, or anything you wouldn't show your employer. Following that, do not post any illegal content. This includes ROMS/ISOs, pirated software, etc.

fields.name: **__#6 - Do not advertise other servers__**
fields.value: The bot will automatically delete discord.gg links; do not try to work around this.  Links that are allowed to be posted are in the #cool-links channel.

fields.name: **__#7 - Do not abuse the bots__**
fields.value: It's spam when you do so, and it will not be tolerated.

fields.name: **__#8 - Self-Bots are not allowed__**
fields.value: It's against TOS and really annoying. Being caught using a self-bot will result in a kick / ban.
